text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/ndh/ValueSet/IndividualAndGroupSpecialtiesVS
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/ndh/ValueSet/NonIndividualSpecialtiesVS

name: SpecialtiesVS
title: Specialties Value Set
publisher: HL7 International - Patient Administration Work Group

contact.name: HL7 International - Patient Administration Work Group

description: Specialties value set based on National Uniform Claim Committee (NUCC) Health Care Provider Taxonomy code set
